body.name: JUMMICO Faux Leather Upholstered Modern Convertible Folding Futon Sofa Bed with Removable Armrests, Adjustable Recliner Couch Bed Loveseat with 2 Cup Holders for Living Room (Leather, Black)
features: Multi function: When you want to rest, you can easily lay the backrest flat, and 2 movable armrest cushions become 2 comfortable pillows, you can sleep comfortably in this bed. And the sofa has 2 hidden cup holders, make a cup of coffee, turn on the Tv and share leisure time with family or friend.

Quality materials: The leather of sofa has been strictly selected. It is made of smooth and comfortable high-quality leather, which is very skin friendly and durable. The thick elastic sponge pad is very breathable and can support your body comfortably.

Modern style: The design of sofa is a classic modern simple style. The delicate leather and the lustrous chrome plated metal legs give a simple and advanced feeling, which can decorate your space and make your room more beautiful and atmospheric.

Easy to install and maintain: There are detailed installation instructions in the box, the installation is very simple, which take about 15 minutes; The high quality leather of the sofa is easy to maintain, and the service life is long, and the stains are stuck carelessly at ordinary times, as long as you wipe it with a wet towel, it will be clean

Excellent After-sale Service: Jummico has an excellent after sale service team, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions, we are glad to serve you. Hope to bring you the best shopping experience.
Adjustable backrest: The backrest of the futon sofa bed is adjustable in 120°, 160° and 180°, so you can simply adjust the angle for comfort in any situation.
CONVERTIBLE SOFA BED: This sleeper sofa quickly and easily transforms into a cozy bed for napping. 2 removable armrests transform into 2 comfortable pillows for support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice couch for a guest room
reviews.reviewText: Was easy to assemble and looks good. I like the cup holder feature. We have it in our spare/game room meaning is not our "main" couch. It's on the smaller side and kinda too firm when you make it a bed, you might need a top to make it softer.Overall, I'm really happy with it since I got it with the purpose of being the spare room couch. Have that in mind

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice small addition to our room
reviews.reviewText: Quite easy to assemble - and I am not a guy who enjoys doing that. Everything fit and was an easy one person job. Well made and looks nice. Just a little small, but we only wanted something small for the occasional company! I actually quite like it!!! Thanks!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great futon for its price and it was very easy to assemble. The only issue I had with it was putting the cup holder in the middle as the screws it comes with aren't exactly long enough for it to nicely fit into the middle. It is a simple fix though as I just went to Lowes and got a longer screw for one of the sides and since I have done that, I have not had any issues. The (head rest/arm rest/back) rest does not stay in place and you can move them around wherever which I like because you can place it in a place for wherever it fits your needs best. It is not the most comfortable place to lay on but it works for having guests over for a night or two. I am overall happy with this product and I'd recommend this futon for whoever has a lot of guest over or even to someone who is just looking for a good size futon for their smaller apartment or room. Overall, I'd recommend this product to anyone looking for furniture for their apartment or home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Buyer beware!!! 3rd Party, So no Returns!!!
reviews.reviewText: This sofa futon sits like 6” off the ground and the cushion is only like 3” thick. It might work in a kids room but if any adult sits on it your knees are up around your head when sitting. The cushions always fall off the sofa while seated. Also, if you are or your guest is over 5’5”, there legs will hang off the end. Also, not comfortable to lay down.This is so misleading.Also, if you get it and don’t like it, you have to pay the shipping to return it and the thing weighs like 50 lbs, so it could cost $150 for postage. Also, the futon will never fit back in the original box.We put it together, realized it was way to small for a couch for us and attempted to return.This is a 3rd party and not an Amazon product so when we tried return it. They apologize d but said they don’t pay returns if we don’t like it. I told them it was too small and they said sorry and we would have to pay for all postage back which will be hundreds of dollars.If I had it to do again, I would go to a brick and mortar store and buy a futon being that these are soooo misleading.I am 100% not happy with this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Middle piece didn't fit
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was so excited to put this together. 1 page instructions and came with everything I need. I got to the middle piece with the cup holder and... It doesn't fit. It doesn't reach the other slide piece to secure it. So it ends up being like a car. You know how usually the middle goes with one side of the seat when you fold it down? Yeah like that. Beautiful material and design otherwise. I'm just terrified if I put the cupholder up someone is gonna sit and lean back and break that middle piece off.It's shorter than the photo appeared. Very low to the ground but it's a fouton so guess I should have known. The pillows I thought would attach somehow for some reason but they are loose and take up more space on the sides than the photo makes it look. They are also pretty flat so not good for resting arms (which I should have known from the photos they are more for the laying down and using as an actual pillow maybe). Took a minute to find them they were inside the zippers underneath along with the middle piece. Overall it took about 30 minutes to put together and was VERY simple. I did it alone. Tipped the box upside down to get it out. Came folded. Just had to add legs and accessories which was awesome. It's pretty easy to move around. Not too heavy. Ugh I would be so happy if that middle piece just fit right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Faux leather sofa.
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the money. Very happy with product. Instructions, center console and cushions are inside sofa. Have to access through zippers on bottom which they don't tell you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deal for price
reviews.reviewText: It is a great deal for price. It is not amazing quality but for the price you cannot beat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This sofa is small, don’t get it for your small apartment tho it’s very uncomfortable. I’m 4’11 and I barely fitted laying down. It’s more for like an office or maybe a bedroom sofa also it is short, even for me it was too low lol. If you do order it and return it make sure to wrap it lol or pay $30 extra dollars to return it.

No es tamaño king size y esta super corrientes en materiales, no vale la pena invertir esa cantidad en algo tan corriente, el envío tardo mucho más de los prometido.me queda claro que estas cosas no se deben comprar en línea.DECEPCIÓN TOTAL
